name: Can KnockDown It 3D
description:
PLAY CAN KNOCKDOWN IT FOR FREE!

Millions of players all around the world are knocking down billions of tin cans every week. Now for those who haven’t yet had a taste, Can Knockdown It FREE is ready to download at no charge!

Challenge your aim, hone your precision, and push your puzzle-solving skills to the next level in this insanely addictive game. This installment takes the critically acclaimed Can Knockdown It to all new heights- the physics-based carnival gameplay you know and love- and adds unique puzzles, adrenaline-charged challenges, and even more explosive action!

A SMASH hit series!
• Multiple challenging levels in beautiful 3D locations
• Puzzles from Easy to Tricky… can you knock them ALL down?
• Show off your skills and challenge your friends!
• Multiple achievements and badges… collect them ALL!
• Gorgeous 3D graphics, optimized for Retina
• Amazing realism, perfectly-tuned physics engine, easy-to-use controls
• Gameplay boosts like multipliers, bonuses, and so much more!
• Unlock new levels, open new locations, and discover hidden secrets!
• Universal app for iPhone, iPad, and iPod
